body.p:
Morganfield Kentucky
October 13th 1865,
Hon Thos E. Bramlette
Gov of Ky
Frankfort Ky
Dear Sir.

Information has been furnished me as Commonwealths atty pro tem that Nicholas Jones & William Jones who have been indicted for the crime of murder at the present term (October) of the Union Circuit Court are now in the town of Mount Vernon, Indiana One of them is quite sick and unable to get away -- but it is his intention so soon as he recovers to leave for parts unknown. I therefore ask that you make a requisition upon the Gov of Indiana for their arrest &c
Enclosed you will find a certified copy of the indictment --
It is regarded a very cold blooded murder and your immediate attention is solicited

Yours &c
Jas F. Clay
Com Atty pro tem
14th Jud Dis --

Requsition on Govr of Indiana for Nicholas & Wm Jones issued & apptd. Agent
17 Oct/65
